name: Alone Together (myiahcat, DevCat💻😼)
description:
On an eerie summer night in the woods, you hear a crash! You go to investigate and see a spaceship and an alien come out. The alien has crash landed on Earth. His ship is totaled and he needs your help. He’s sad and scared and you have to help him find the missing parts of his spaceship in the dark with a special light 🔦.  Beware, the light will dim over time. If you run out of light or time, game over! 

Creators :

Elizabeth Catwell - Artist 

Naomi Catwell - Programmer, Game designer 

Myiah Catwell - Programmer, Game designer 

Li Wah D'Angelo - An ideas guy

Date : August 2022

Credits : 

Poptropica - 24 Carrot (House) music

Warped Vehicles

stringstar fields

Mossy Cavern

Free Pixel Art Forest

Keyboard controls and instructions :
  • Gato the cat - move with WASD  or Arrow keys and collect the spaceship pieces
  • Tantan the alien - move with the mouse, collect light/time powerups and reveal the spaceship pieces with the light
